scripts.prebuild:dev-client: cd .. && yarn prepare && npm pack && mv react-native-android-widget-* ./example-expo && cd example-expo && yarn add ./react-native-android-widget*
scripts.prebuild:apk: cd .. && yarn prepare && npm pack && mv react-native-android-widget-* ./example-expo && cd example-expo && yarn add ./react-native-android-widget*
scripts.preinstall: cd .. && yarn prepare && npm pack && mv react-native-android-widget-* ./example-expo && cd example-expo && yarn add ./react-native-android-widget*
